refnamediv.refpurpose: get the remote output of a PAsolve execution

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: A call to this function can be done on a PAResl object returned by a PAsolve call in order to get the output of a remote execution. The result must be available before using PAgetLogs. You can use PAwaitFor to make sure that the result is available.

listitem.para: an object of type PAResl returned by a call to PAsolve.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting:
-->deff ("y=hello(x)","disp(''hello ''+x),y=%t","n");
-->hello('World')
hello World ans =
T
-->r=PAsolve('hello','World')
Job submitted : 16 r =
(1): Awaited (J:16)
-->r r =
(1): [ pendule ] hello World
T
-->PAgetLogs(r(1)) ans =
[ pendule ] hello World
